Txt_Talk_SmallShrine_B1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Hello there, youngster! You don't happen to have a wrecking ball about your person, do you?
*: Well then, what are you waiting for? Get yourself down to the Path of Promise! It's next to a spring somewhere, I think...
*: You don't!? Goodness, child, whatever are you thinking? Get back to Reeve and find one!
*: As the name suggests, the Path of Promise leads intrepid travellers to pastures new.
*: What you make of your new surroundings when you get there is up to you, of course!

Txt_Talk_SmallShrine_B1F_SearchObj_BookS.Text: It's a book about boomerangs and whips. Do you want to read it?
<6>Whips and boomerangs allow their wielder to attack multiple enemies simultaneously.
<6>Whips can hit entire groups, while a boomerang will damage every enemy on the field.
<6>Though their attack may seem somewhat limited, used tactically, they can confer a great advantage.<9>
